Name: What can be done during Heat (general)
Description: All moves will deal chip damage on block
Comment: Cannot K.O. with chip damage, chip damage turns into recoverable health gauge

Name: What can be done during Heat (general)
Description: A Heat Dash can be used when a Heat Engager hits or is blocked (after activation, Heat will end)
Comment: Until Heat Engager reaches the opponent {f-hold} (or {HBHS}), additional chip damage on block

Name: What can be done during Heat (general)
Description: Heat Smash, a move that causes critical damage, can be activated (after activation, Heat will end)
Comment: During Heat {HBHS} (or {2+3})

Name: What can be done during Heat (unique)
Description: Some hold moves can have shortened max level holds
Comment: {db,1,2} hold, etc.

Name: What can be done during Heat (unique)
Description: Allows the use of the powered up version of Bear Roll
Comment: While crouching {1+2}, during Bear Roll {1}, etc.

Name: What can be done during Heat (unique)
Description: Allows the use of Panda Shooting Star

Name: Heat Burst
Comment: Partially uses remaining Heat time {2+3,b,b} to cancel attack

Name: Bear Slash
Comment: {b,1,d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting (does not shift when using Heat Dash), absorb an attack to power up and deal more chip damage on block

Name: Bear X
Comment: Chip damage, {b,1+2,d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting (does not shift when using Heat Dash)

Name: Rabid Bear
Comment: Chip damage, {f,f,f-hold,1+2,d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting (does not shift when using Heat Dash)

Name: Frolicking Bear
Comment: Shift to Hunting (does not shift when using Heat Dash)

Name: Panda Shooting Star
Comment: Also possible during Bear Roll, shift to Bear Sit, partially uses remaining Heat time

Name: Panda Super Attack
Comment: Or with Heat activated during Hunting {2+3}, Heat Smash {2+3,f-hold} to shift to Bear Roll, {2+3,d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting

Name: Close Call! Panda Storming Flower
Comment: Rage Art, erases opponent's recoverable health on hit

Name: Angry Lumberjack
Comment: Chip damage on block

Name: Hunting
Comment: Or while down and facing down {3+4}, to shift to Hunting

Name: Honey Trap
Comment: Chip damage on block

Name: Bear Sit
Comment: Or {db,3+4}, {d,3+4,f-hold} to shift to Bear Roll, {d,3+4,b-hold} to shift to California Roll

Name: Double Wild Slap
Comment: Can hold, {db,1,2,d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting

Name: Double Wild Slap
Comment: Chip damage on block, {db,1,2} hold {d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting

Name: Fresh Wild Slap
Comment: Chip damage on block, has reversal break effect, shortened hold during Heat (consumes remaining time), {db,1,2} hold {d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting

Name: Bear Lariat
Comment: {db,2,d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting

Name: Salmon Hunter
Comment: Hold to power up and deal more chip damage on block

Name: Salmon Hunter
Comment: Chip damage on block

Name: Fresh Salmon Hunter
Comment: Chip damage on block

Name: Bear Slash
Comment: {b,1,d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting (does not shift when using Heat Dash), absorb an attack to power up and deal more chip damage on block

Name: Howling Bear
Comment: {b,2,1,d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting, {b,2,1,f-hold} to shift to Bear Roll

Name: Bear X
Comment: Chip damage, {b,1+2,d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting (does not shift when using Heat Dash)

Name: High Jinks
Comment: Or while rising {3+4}

Name: Deadly Claw
Comment: {b,1+4,d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting

Name: Rolling Bear
Comment: {b,1+4,f,f-hold} to extend

Name: Bear Skip
Comment: {ub,1+2,d-hold} (or {3+4}) to cancel and shift to Hunting

Name: Big Bear Attack
Comment: {u,1+2,d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting

Name: Pancake Press
Comment: Shift to Bear Sit

Name: Hornet Sweep
Comment: Or {ub,1} or {u,1}, chip damage on block

Name: Ultra Kuma
Comment: Or {ub,2} or {u,2}

Name: Bear Double Hop Kick Combo
Comment: {uf,3,4,1+2,d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting

Name: Falling Bear
Comment: Chip damage, to shift to Hunting, {f,f-hold,1+2,f-hold} to shift to Bear Roll

Name: Anger Hook
Comment: Chip damage on block

Name: Grizzly Claw Smash
Comment: Chip damage on block

Name: Leaping Side Kick
Comment: Chip damage on block

Name: Rabid Bear
Comment: Chip damage, {f,f,f-hold,1+2,d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting (does not shift when using Heat Dash)

Name: Ki Charge
Comment: Cannot block when it is still in effect / Automatic counter hit

Name: Killing Claws
Comment: Can hold at last step, while rising {1,2,d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting

Name: Killing Claws
Comment: Chip damage on block, while rising {1,2} hold {d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting

Name: Fresh Killing Claws
Comment: Chip damage on block, has reversal break effect, shortened hold during Heat (consumes remaining time), while rising {1,2} hold {d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting

Name: Bear Roll
Comment: Shift to Bear Roll

Name: Hunting
Comment: Shift to Hunting, {db-hold} to shift to crouching state, {ub} (or {u} or {uf}) to shift to standing state

Name: Honeycomb Spike
Comment: Can hold at last step

Name: Honeycomb Spike
Comment: Chip damage on block

Name: Fresh Honeycomb Spike
Comment: Chip damage on block, has reversal break effect, shortened hold during Heat (consumes remaining time)

Name: Bear Claw
Comment: Shift to Hunting

Name: Bear Tackle
Comment: Absorb an attack to power up and deal more chip damage on block

Name: Hunting Hip Smash
Comment: Or during Hunting {b,3+4}, shift to Bear Sit

Name: Frolicking Bear
Comment: Shift to Hunting (does not shift when using Heat Dash)

Name: Break'n
Comment: During Hunting {b,1+2,d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting

Name: Bear Roll
Comment: Shift to Bear Roll, becomes special mid attack during Heat (partially uses remaining Heat time)

Name: Backward Roll
Comment: Or during Bear Sit {b-hold}, during Hunting {b,b,d-hold} (or {3+4}) to shift to Hunting

Name: Bear Sit
Comment: Shift to Bear Sit

Name: Rebound
Comment: Shift to Bear Sit {3+4,f-hold} to shift to Bear Roll

Name: Bear Roll
Comment: Shift to Bear Roll, becomes special mid attack during Heat (partially uses remaining Heat time)

Name: Bear Roll
Comment: Shift to Bear Roll, becomes special mid attack during Heat (partially uses remaining Heat time)

Comment: Shift to Hunting

Comment: Shift to Bear Sit

Name: Bear Butterfly
Comment: Shift to Hunting

Name: Bear Roll
Comment: Shift to Bear Roll, becomes special mid attack during Heat (partially uses remaining Heat time)

Comment: Throw escape {1} or {2}

Name: Bear Hug
Comment: Throw escape {1} or {2}

Name: Bear Slam
Comment: Throw escape {1}

Name: Choke Slam
Comment: Throw escape {2}

Comment: Cannot throw escape
